projectDescription: A scalable online store built with Django, PostgreSQL, and Solid.js for a fast, responsive frontend. Features include payment gateway integration and user authentication.
A task management tool developed with Flask and MongoDB, featuring a Solid.js frontend for real-time updates and a clean, intuitive interface.
A custom WordPress theme for a personal blog, optimized for SEO and performance, with a focus on user-friendly content management.
A Shopify store with a custom theme built for a small business, integrating product listings and payment processing.
